convoluter module¶

Convolutionally applies a saved Tensorflow model to a larger image, displaying the result as a heatmap overlay.

class convoluter.Convoluter(whole_image, model_dir, size, num_classes, batch_size, use_fp16, save_folder='')[source]¶
